scripts.start: npm run build:happ && npm run start:agent
scripts.network: npm run build:happ && concurrently-repeat "npm run start:agent"
scripts.start:agent: cross-env HC_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run playground" "npm run start:happ" "yarn --cwd ../../ui ioen"
scripts.test: npm run build:happ && npm t -w tests
scripts.start:happ: RUST_LOG=warn hc s generate ./workdir/happ/ioen-profiles.happ --run=$HC_PORT -a ioen-profiles network  --bootstrap https://bootstrap-staging.holo.host/ quic
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:dna && hc app pack workdir/happ
scripts.build:dna: npm run build:zome && hc dna pack workdir/dna
